entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few showers beginning early this evening and ending late this evening then 30 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 5 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. A few rain showers and wet flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. Temperature falling to plus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow or rain. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few rain showers and wet flurries ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain or light snow changing to 30 percent chance of light snow near midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
